name: GrandmotherWisdom
0:
”Alexa, open Grandmother Wisdom”
”Alexa, start Grandmother Wisdom”
”Alexa, launch Grandmother Wisdom”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: grandmother wisdom
Developer Terms of Use
des: In the midst of modernity we're starved for wisdom, nostalgia and most importantly, common sense. Our grandmothers are better at providing that than anyone. Born from the Hashtag Grandmother Wisdom on twitter, this app has compiled has over 100's of our grandmothers' most memorable quotes from over the years. Take a listen and see if your grandmother made the list!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
